CustomField.formula:
IF(
TEXT(Status__c )="Unenrolled",
"Unenrolled",
IF(OR(TEXT(Assigned_Seat__c)="Deactivated", TEXT(Status__c )="Deactivated"),
"Deactivated",
IF(TEXT(Status__c )="Complete",
"Complete",
IF(Expired__c=True,
"Expired",
IF( ISNULL(Date_Last_Accessed__c) = True,
"Assigned",
Text(Status__c) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Learner Status
